content.description: Black Beans And Caffeine stand starts and follows the black line in the photo on bomber rock - crimp jugs and solid but slick feet.  Mantle and the easiest walkoff is to the left.Climber and spotter should mind the potential fall backward from the cliff band to the level below.

Tijuana Timebomb sit starts in the same location as Chorizo Power but uses a matched hands start on the right sidepull of the obvious bix block as a lieback (or however you want to manage the matched start).Figure out the right spot for the feet to make cranking the matched lieback work best and access the next holds. Work up and exit to the right of the boxy roof overhead.  Noticeably more powerful and specific of a start than Chorizo Power.

Sopapilla Machine Broke is a Sit Start on a corner just to the right of Cash Only Pendejo.Sit Start on a left hand Gaston and right hand on the big sloper jug at 1-2 o’clock. Figure feet out and lift off to gain a positive crimp. Swing into the line without dabbing and Topout.
content.protection: 1 pad and mindful spotter. Beware of spotter backing off cliff!
content.location: The corner to the right of Black Beans And Caffeine and Cash Only Pendejo

climbs.name: Side Of Pulled Pork And Lime

content.description: Great first boulder for the area. Super simple to find and climb as a sit start with a match on the red circle.
content.location: On the top of the second ridge look to the right while facing No Limit To The Low and it's before the water.

content.description: No Limit To The Low sits on the west side of 40 Foot Hole canyon 2 cliff band levels up from the basement where the water runs past Hollywood Homicide wall and Clayface boulder.Sit Start with your tailbone on the stone, matched on a positive set of connected crimps to the right of the bulge protruding from the wall. No pads beneath this lowball roof or you wouldn’t fit! Place the pad outside of the start area to cushion your head if you dry fire off these weird moves. From the start your head will probably be under the bulge roof.Lift off the ground from these connected crimps and bust some moves to get up and around the big bulge.***the disconnected pedestal rocks are OFF***Tricky, low, blind and fun. I don’t want to give too many hints but fun techniques make this one go from awkward and hard to a sequenced breeze.
content.protection: 1 pad positioned outside of start area to protect head in case of dryfire

content.description: Do You Have Jamaica starts matched on a box Undercling as a stand start. Figure out a stance that works and control the start. Work up on bomber incuts and solid rock.
content.location: Left of Chorizo Power - a few feet left of the big boxy roof feature. Start matched on Undercling box.

content.description: Chorizo Power starts beneath a block roof and free overhead as a Sit Starr with left hand in a nice incut vertical crimp and right hand around the right edge of the big obvious block in a hug. Pick your feet and pull.Land the next moves in the incut sidepulls and work up and last the left side of the blocky roof to topout. Mild through and through but can be used as a good warmup for the harder stuff nearby.

Cash Only Pendejo follows the same line as Black Beans And Caffeine VB but uses a thin Undercling crimp left of center for a Matched Hands start. Figure out the body position to make this work and control the first move. After getting control access a solid second hold and work up the wall.

Taco Truck Wall sits 2 levels up from the basement of the canyon where Hollywood Homicide and Clayface sit.  

  Problems span across Taco Truck Wall end to end all the way north to where the waterfalls run.  

  These problems are more technical and difficult than those below and the landings to the southern problems are good but spotters and climbers need to be aware of the secondary falls if they roll or back off the ledge.
